zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究中心
en: Institute For Advanced Study, Tsinghua University

location.zh-cn: 中国北京市海淀区清华大学科学馆

description.zh-cn: 清华大学下属的基础科学研究实体，原名清华大学高等研究中心，于1997年6月成立。
description.en: An entity for basic science research affiliated with Tsinghua University, formerly known as the Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study, established in June 1997.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府，清华大学高等研究院的隶属单位。
description.en: A top institution of higher education in China, to which the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University is affiliated.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家、教育家，曾任清华大学校长。自2012年2月起担任清华大学高等研究院院长，同时也是该院教员。
description.en: A Chinese physicist and educator, former president of Tsinghua University. He has served as the Dean of the Institute for Advanced Study at Tsinghua University since February 2012 and is also a faculty member.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主。自1997年6月清华大学高等研究中心成立起即担任名誉主任（后为名誉院长），同时也是该院教员。
description.en: A physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics. He has served as the Honorary Director (later Honorary Dean) of the Institute for Advanced Study at Tsinghua University since its establishment in June 1997 and is also a faculty member.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家。自1997年6月清华大学高等研究中心成立起即担任主任，同时也是该院教员。
description.en: A physicist. He served as the Director of the Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study since its establishment in June 1997 and is also a faculty member.

description.zh-cn: 为清华大学高等研究院（原高等研究中心）募集资金而在香港注册成立的基金会。
description.en: A foundation registered in Hong Kong to raise funds for the Institute for Advanced Study at Tsinghua University (formerly the Center for Advanced Study).

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院计算机科学教员。

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院计算机科学教员。
description.en: Computer Science faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 计算机科学家，图灵奖得主，清华大学高等研究院计算机科学教员。
description.en: A computer scientist, Turing Award recipient, and Computer Science faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院生物物理教员。
description.en: Biophysics faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院密码学教员。
description.en: Cryptography faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 密码学家，清华大学高等研究院密码学教员。
description.en: A cryptographer and a Cryptography faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院数学教员。
description.en: Mathematics faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院数学教员。
description.en: Mathematics faculty member at the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院是清华大学下属的研究实体。
description.en: The Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University is a research entity affiliated with Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学高等研究中心（研究院前身）的成立中扮演了关键角色，并出任首位名誉主任。
description.en: Played a key role in the establishment of the Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study (the predecessor of the Institute) and served as its first Honorary Director.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学高等研究中心（研究院前身）的成立中扮演了关键角色，并出任首位主任。
description.en: Played a key role in the establishment of the Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study (the predecessor of the Institute) and served as its first Director.

description.zh-cn: 2012年2月，顾秉林担任清华大学高等研究院院长，同时也是该院教员。
description.en: In February 2012, Gu Binglin became the Dean of the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University, and is also a faculty member.

position.zh-cn: 名誉主任, 名誉院长, 教员
position.en: Honorary Director, Honorary Dean, Faculty Member

description.zh-cn: 自1997年6月成立起，杨振宁担任清华大学高等研究院（原高等研究中心）的名誉主任/院长，同时也是该院教员。
description.en: Since its establishment in June 1997, Yang Chen-Ning has served as the Honorary Director/Dean of the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University (formerly the Center for Advanced Study) and is also a faculty member.

description.zh-cn: 自1997年6月成立起，聂华桐担任清华大学高等研究中心主任，同时也是该院教员。
description.en: Since its establishment in June 1997, Nieh Hwa-Tung served as the Director of the Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study and is also a faculty member.

relationships.source: 清华大学高等研究中心基金会有限公司

description.zh-cn: 该基金会有限公司的成立旨在为清华大学高等研究院（原高等研究中心）募集资金。
description.en: This foundation was established to raise funds for the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University (formerly the Center for Advanced Study).

relationships.source: 清华大学高等研究中心基金会有限公司

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究中心基金会有限公司于1998年3月13日在香港注册成立。
description.en: The Tsinghua University Center for Advanced Study Foundation Co., Ltd. was registered and established in Hong Kong on March 13, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院的地址位于北京市海淀区清华大学科学馆。
description.en: The address of the Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University is at the Science Building, Tsinghua University, Haidian District, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学高等研究院位于北京市。
description.en: The Institute for Advanced Study, Tsinghua University is located in Beijing.
